OOC: Just make her head for a spaceport. She'll be alone unless
someone else wishes to join her. Go on and have fun!

BIC:

Prophetus was furious. He blasted his way through the ceiling of the
vault and started climbing to the surface.

Prophetus: DON'T YOU GET IT? YOU ARE THE LAST ONE OF YOUR KIND! YOU
ARE ALONE AND WILL BE FOREVER! EVEN PREDACONS WILL REJECT YOU!

He swung a huge bladed tail towards her.
